findings.rationale: A fixed duration of five years may be insufficient for certain types of confidential information, potentially exposing sensitive data after the NDA expires.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for a period of five (5) years from the date of execution.

findings.rationale: Allowing injunctive relief without posting bond can create a risk of unfair advantage, as it may enable one party to act without financial accountability.
findings.evidence_quote: the Disclosing Party shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief without posting bond or other security.

findings.rationale: Restrictions on assignment may limit flexibility for both parties and could complicate future business arrangements or transactions.
findings.evidence_quote: Neither party may assign this Agreement without the prior written consent of the other party.
